name: Siren Head REMAKE
description:
This is a remake of a Siren Head game I made. In this game, you search around an area where Siren Head lurks around. There was an investigation from the previous owners of the building in the area.

CONTROLS:

W A S D - Move

Mouse - Look around

Hold Shift - Run

E - Interact

Escape - QuitSiren Head is a fictional humanoid monster created in 2018 by the Canadian artist respectfully known as Trevor Henderson.
